official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to revise the method of determining cost-of-living increases payable to civil service annuitants.

summary.text: Revises the method of determining cost-of-living increases payable to civil service annuitants by requiring periodic adjustments within two months after there is a 3 percent increase in the Consumer Price Index.
